analysis_disability: The statement "Ability to lift up to 50 pounds, and walk and stand for most of the shift" lacks clarity regarding whether these tasks need to be performed manually or if assistance is available. This ambiguity can deter individuals who could fulfill these requirements with reasonable accommodations or assistance.
analysis_general: "must pass both a drug screening and background check prior to employment" might discourage individuals with past substance issues or minor legal troubles from applying, even if they are rehabilitated and capable of performing the job duties.
text: $1500 SIGN-ON BONUS OFFERED Limited time offer. $500 at 30 days, $500 at 90 days, $500 at 180 days We are looking for a warehouse worker to participate in our warehouse operations and activities. You will store materials, pick, and scan orders. The goal is to increase efficiency, profitability and customer satisfaction. Empire Auto Parts is a growing company. We hope you consider Empire Auto Parts to be the type of place you look to further your career. Responsibilities Assemble customer orders from stock, and place orders in appropriate holding area for delivery or pickup, according to schedule (pick, load, pack, label) Receive and process warehouse stock products (pick, unload, label, store) Perform inventory controls and keep quality standards high for audits Keep a clean, safe working environment and ensure warehouse is accessible for all authorized traffic Report any discrepancies Communicate and cooperate with supervisors and coworkers Operate and maintain preventative warehouse vehicles and equipment Follow quality service standards and comply with procedures, rules, and regulations Requirements Good organizational and time management skills Ability to lift up to 50 pounds, and walk and stand for most of the shift Ability to work within a set parameter of safety rules and protocols, such as observing proper lifting procedures, wear certain protective items to meet safety requirements. High school degree, or equivalent Previous experience with warehouse a plus Knowledge of auto parts and auto body parts a plus Forklift training and certification a plus Benefits: Paid vacation, personal days, and holidays Medical & dental insurance (after 90 days) 401k plan Monday. Friday, no weekends bonus will be subject to all necessary withholding Company Description Empire Auto Parts sells quality replacement auto body and cooling parts, with 17 locations serving 13 Northeast and Mid-Atlantic states. Empire is also a Certified Automotive Parts Association (CAPA) member and an Automotive Body Parts Association (ABPA) member. OUR QUALITY POLICY Empire Auto Parts distributes quality replacement auto parts in an efficient, accurate and transparent way. We continually refine our standards to maintain our position as a leader in quality and service. Empire Auto Parts is a drug-free workplace. All applicants must pass both a drug screening and background check prior to employment. Empire Auto Parts is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
